attributes.action: Abolish Parliament, the Common Law, the UK and individual freedom and give the country  to Brussels  to be run by and for the French and the Germans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should acknowledge the inevitable fact that, the way things are going, the unelected bureaucrats of Brussels,  working in the French and German traditions that Individuals are there to serve the State and its functionaries not vice versa, are taking over the UK. By handing over total power to Europe now, and allowing the UK to be run from Brussels (and Berlin and Paris)we shall save our selves a lot of trouble.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
